**Special Containment Procedures:** Investigation into SCP-031-VN is still underway. All information regarding the anomaly must be reported to Parainformation Division at Site-75-VN.

**Description:** SCP-031-VN refers to mentions of “Unreality” and “Department of Unreality” in Site-75-VN’s internal documents, despite there being no such department or research field within Site-75-VN specifically, or in the Foundation as a whole.

From the time of its discovery to when this document was written, SCP-031-VN has proliferated and is estimated to have affected approximately 3.4% of all documents at Site-75-VN.

**Addendum-1:** Discovery

SCP-031-VN was discovered on 31/02/2024 by Director Nguyễn Thuỳ Trang and Vice Director Phan Văn Mạnh of the Parainformation Division while reviewing reports.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= **[BEGIN LOG]**

= <//Unrelated contents truncated.//>

**Dir. Trang:** And this report from… wait, what is Unreality?

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** Hmm? What are you talking about?

**Dir. Trang:**  Look at this, <//Dir. Trang passes the document to Vice Dir. Mạnh//> “Department of… Unreality”. We don’t have any department with that name, do we?

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** Perhaps it’s a department from overseas?

**Dir. Trang:**  These are reports from Site-75-VN itself. But even if there was a mix-up, there’s no way anyone would submit a blank sheet of paper.

= <//Dir. Trang searches for Unreality on SciP.net database but finds no result//>

**Dir. Trang:** Even SciP Net yielded no result. I have also read the list containing all the research departments, and I doubt memory failed me.

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** Unreality... Unreality... Sounds like starving, isn't it??

**Dir. Trang:** What do you mean??

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** “"Unreal" sounds like "no meal".[[footnote]]Translator note: the words "reality" and "food" are homonyms in Vietnamese.[[/footnote]] This is probably a prank.

**Dir. Trang:** Maybe it’s the work of that [https://scp-vn.wikidot.com/scp-088-vn typo]. Actually no, that can’t be it.

= <//Dir. Trang’s computer displays a new notification.//>

**Dir. Trang:** Mạnh, there are suddenly 2 new results! They’re in… wait, [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/secure-facility-dossier-site-75-vn our site’s facility dossier]?

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** They’re from our division as well! //<reading from text on computer screen>// “…in relevant fields, including: Antimemetic, Miscommunications, Artificial Intelligence Applications, Surrealistics and Unreality”.

**Dir. Trang:** We are able to communicate with all of those departments except for… that one. And the last edit was 2 months ago, by me, yet these only appeared a few minutes ago.

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** I don’t know, chief. This is definitely an anomaly.

**Dir. Trang:** Or an extranormal event at least, this is worth reporting. The second thing is… “Reality liaison Alex Thorley of the Department of Unreality will be transferred to Site-75-VN…”, that was from a month ago. Can you check if there’s anyone named Thorley in our site?

= <//Vice Dir. Mạnh uses his computer to check.//>

**Vice Dir. Mạnh:** Absolutely no one.

**Dir. Trang:** Definitely an anomaly then.
 
= **[END LOG]**
[[/div]]
